meanings.definition: To spend the summer at a particular place.
meanings.sent1: We are summering at the beach this year.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys summering in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The family is summering by the lake, fishing and swimming.
meanings.sent4: The birds are summering in the trees, chirping happily.
meanings.sent5: I look forward to summering in the countryside, surrounded by nature.

meanings.definition: The act of spending the summer at a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Our summering in the countryside was filled with outdoor adventures.
meanings.sent2: The resort offers luxurious accommodations for summering guests.
meanings.sent3: His idea of summering involves relaxing by the pool all day.
meanings.sent4: The town's summering population swells during the tourist season.
